page.title: 14LAW & ORDER / LIFE STYLE
page.content: The officers said it was an enjoyable job for police to work in Meopham and the people are friendly.Meopham have 2 unmarked cars and 3 marked and 3 motorbikes.There are 2 detectives at the station.The most common crime in Meopham is burglary and speeding. LIFE STYLE 3 householders in Steeles Lane were asked what appliances they had.Most people had a t.v. and some have a video.Not many had a dishwasher.Each house had two reception rooms and all of the houses had a front and back garden. In Hodsoll Street there is 1 bus stop,1 pub,1 postbox,a village hall, 3 farms,2 parks,1 telephone box,4 public bins and 41 houses.There are lots of trees and overgrown bushes along roads.Mostly old pensioners living in Hodsoll Street.
